extendedInfo.description: The Asian Age is the only Indian newspaper with an international edition (London). It has a perfect blend of National and International News. The Asian Age is global in more ways than one. It has established a unique editorial tie-up with one of the world's leading global English newspapers. The Asian Age is the only Indian newspaper with an international edition (London).  The paper has a perfect blend of in-depth national and international news, features and analysis. The Asian Ageâs Android App provides you an opportunity to avail the complete newspaper -- latest news from across India, business stories, entertainment and lifestyle, and comment from a long list of experts, from Shobhaa De to Shashi Tharooor. This app brings the newspaper and its content to readers for free, while enabling them to personalise, select and share news from anywhere in the world.FEATURESâ¢	All content available for free.â¢	Top News: Latest news as and when they occur from all over the world.â¢	India: Updated Stories from all over India.â¢	International: Updated stories from all over the world.â¢	Business and Sports: Business and sports articles from India and around the world.â¢	Cities: News from various cities in India, with special editions from Delhi, Mumbai and Kolkata.â¢	Entertainment: Latest movie reviews and updates from Bollywood, Hollywood and also Television.â¢	Lifestyle: Stories from fashion, health, corporate, stress, pets, books, latest trends, cars and bikes and many more.â¢	Opinion: Columns from some of the biggest names in the business of Sports, Arts, Entertainment, Business and Lifestyle. â¢	Age on Sunday: Sundayâs special supplement from print edition.â¢	Share: Users can share their favorite stories through mail, facebook and twitter.â¢	Comment: Users can post comments for any and every story.â¢	Breaking news: Get Breaking news and other alerts from Asian Age via push notification.â¢	Simple and easy navigation.

reviews.title: Nicely nd not so sophisticatedly designed good app!
reviews.comment: All columns and rows are well sorted, it do what it states. But onething which i felt that its selection popup is flawed doesnt appear correctly on my galaxy note also news which it shows is not latest but of last day like a newsppr, would like developers to rectify it. App is good, dont expect much graphics but good news. Notifications could have been better.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Does not work
reviews.comment: Does not work at all, just keeps loading. Wish there was a way to hand over negative stars to an app
reviews.author: Keith Dsouza

reviews.title: Cant seem to get it to work
reviews.comment: It just keeps and keeps updating itself for ever and ever
reviews.author: A Google User
